name: Arbertova
description:
This is an  Alpha still in development horror game. It was made in scratch and it look like that im going to work on that so it looks as clean as posible. This game is a retro style where a monster chases you (the monster is from scratchs assets and im going to fix that later).It has still some design flaws and bugs and im working on fixing that.

Please write me an feedback and things i could add.
